mapper.select: SELECT M.*, U.USER_NAME FROM MARKET M JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ WHERE M.TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY M.MK_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{finish};
SELECT count(*) FROM MARKET WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MARKET (NOTICE_YN, USER_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENTS, MK_DATE, PRICE, READ_CNT, THUMBNAIL) VALUES 'N', #{user_seq}, #{title}, #{contents}, SYSDATE, #{price}, #{read_cnt}, #{thumbnail})
mapper.select: SELECT M.MK_SEQ, M.USER_SEQ, M.TITLE, M.READ_CNT, U.USER_NAME, M.CONTENTS, M.price, TO_CHAR(M.MK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MK_DATE FROM MARKET M JOIN USER_INFO U ON M.USER_SEQ = U.USER_SEQ WHERE M.MK_SEQ = #{mk_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE MARKET SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE MK_SEQ = #{mk_seq}
UPDATE MARKET SET TITLE = #{title}, USER_SEQ = #{user_seq}, PRICE = #{price}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, THUMBNAIL = #{thumbnail}, UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MK_SEQ = #{mk_seq}
